name: Asteroid Annihilator (UU Soft)
description:
Asteroid Annihilator is a 2D arcade-style game developed using the SDL2 library. The game puts players in the role of a spaceship pilot who must defend the galaxy from an endless horde of asteroids. The objective is to survive for as long as possible and score as many points as possible by destroying as many asteroids as possible.

The game features simple but intuitive controls that are easy to pick up and play. Players move their spaceship around the screen using the ◀️ ▶️ or A D and use the 🔼 or W to fire lasers at incoming asteroids.

Overall, Asteroid Annihilator is a nostalgic and engaging experience that combines retro-style arcade game play with modern elements to create a challenging and entertaining game that appeals to a wide audience. It is a perfect time pass for those who love the nostalgia of arcade games and enjoy the thrill of dodging and destroying asteroids.
